Sequence Information.Peptide Name: MK-578 (Synthetic AMPs, Mastoparan analog, XXA, UCLL1c)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (60%) toPd_mastoparan PDD-BA=k: 21%, I=M: 14%.Activity: Active against E. coli (MIC 23.4 ug/ml), P.aeruginosa (MIC 125 ug/ml), S. aureus (MIC 42.9 ug/ml), and B. subtilis (MIC 11.7 ug/ml).Structure:  random coil in water and helical in 8 mM SDS or 40% TFE. Lless helical than the parent peptide.
Literature Information.Author: de Souza BM, Dos Santos Cabrera MP, Neto JR, Palma MS. 2011
Literature Information.Title: Investigating the effect of different positioning of lysine residues along the peptide chain of mastoparans for their secondary structures and biological activities.
